duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement new and modify existing engineered labor standards in warehouse operations.
Support regional operations projects in warehouse automation, facility layout, and transportation.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient and safe work methods.
Perform process simulations to assess impact on labor productivity and applicable incentive programs.
Serve as a mentor and adviser to divisional personnel within work methods and labor management software.
Monitor and analyze warehouse and delivery operations, ensuring successful implementation and identifying opportunities for efficiencies.
Maintain high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process and beyond.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, required (Industrial Engineering degree preferred).
